sentence.Network_en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentence.Network_en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentence.Network_cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentence.Network_en: The secret to happiness is to keep setting yourself new challenges.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸福的秘诀就是要不停地给自己设定新的挑战。

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 中文名称：Happiness! 日文名：はぴねす！ 地区：日本 语言：日语STAFF 原作：ういんどみる キャラ原案：こ～ちゃ 监督：原博 シリーズ构成・脚本：西园悟 キャラデザ・総作监：小関雅 アニメ制作：アートランドCAST（演员阵容） 小日向 雄真：大原 崇 神坂 春姫：榊原ゆい 柊 杏璃：成瀬未亜 高峰 小雪：日向裕罗 小日向 すもも：后藤麻衣 式守 伊吹：壱智村小真 上条 沙耶：伊藤 静 高沟 八辅：川

entry.def: Someone who is happy has feelings of pleasure, usually because something nice has happened or because they feel satisfied with their life.

example.ex: Marina was a confident, happy child...
example.tran: 玛丽娜是个自信、快乐的孩子。

example.ex: I'm just happy to be back running...
example.tran: 我很高兴能重新回到跑道上。

entry.tran: （时光、地点或关系）令人愉快的，幸福的
entry.def: A happy time, place, or relationship is full of happy feelings and pleasant experiences, or has an atmosphere in which people feel happy.

example.ex: Except for her illnesses, she had had a particularly happy childhood...
example.tran: 除了体弱多病外，她的童年特别幸福。

example.ex: It had always been a happy place...
example.tran: 这里从前一直是个令人愉快的地方。

entry.tran: （对情况或安排）满意的，放心的
entry.def: If you are happy about a situation or arrangement, you are satisfied with it, for example because you think that something is being done in the right way.

example.ex: If you are not happy about a repair, go back and complain...
example.tran: 如果你对修理效果不满意，可以再找他们投诉。

example.ex: He's happy that I deal with it myself...
example.tran: 我自己把事情解决了，对此他很满意。

entry.def: If you say you are happy to do something, you mean that you are very willing to do it.

example.ex: I'll be happy to answer any questions if there are any...
example.tran: 如果有问题，我很乐意回答。

example.ex: That's a risk I'm happy to take.

entry.def: Happy is used in greetings and other conventional expressions to say that you hope someone will enjoy a special occasion.
A happy coincidence is one that results in something pleasant or helpful happening.

example.ex: By happy coincidence, Robert met Richard and Julia and discovered they were experiencing similar problems.
example.tran: 幸运的是，罗伯特碰巧遇到了理查德和朱莉娅，发现原来他们也碰到了类似的问题。

means.word_mean: 1. state of well-being characterized by emotions ranging from contentment to intense joy
2. emotions experienced when in a state of well-being

auth_sentence.content: For me, happiness is the struggle to live.
auth_sentence.res_content: For me, happiness is the struggle to live.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For me, happiness is the struggle to live.

auth_sentence.content: Surely all this happiness can't be for real.
auth_sentence.res_content: Surely all this happiness can't be for real.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surely all this happiness can't be for real.

auth_sentence.content: In Somalia, happiness is a meal for today.
auth_sentence.res_content: In Somalia, happiness is a meal for today.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In Somalia, happiness is a meal for today.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偶然的,无计划的,随意的,杂乱无章的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hap机会,运气+hazard冒险的事,游戏→运气加游戏→偶然的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 快乐的,幸福的;乐意的;令人满意的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hap机会,运气+y……的→happy有运气的→幸福的
per全部+hap机会,运气+s表复数→全部都是机会,运气[决定]
hap机会,运气+hazard冒险的事,游戏→运气加游戏→偶然的
happy[adj.快乐的,幸福的;乐意的;令人满意的]+ness性质,状态→happiness幸福,幸运
hap机会,运气+en表动词→happen机会来了→发生

Sentence.sentence: The derived happiness from the constructive work.
It is essential to our well-being, our health, our happiness.
In its2011-2012survey,the World Economic Forum ranked Sweden as the "rock star of the recovery"in the Washington Post,also leads the world in life satisfaction and happiness.
But economists who study the relationship between money and happiness have consistently found that, above a certain income, the two do not reliably correlate.
More money does not necessarily bring greater happiness

sentences.en: A gust of happiness swept through her.
sentences.cn: 一股幸福的暖流流遍她的全身。

sentences.en: A merchant’s happiness hangs upon luck.
An idle person will never find or understand real happiness.
sentences.cn: 一个懒汉永远找不到也永远不懂得真正的幸福。
快活并不总是意味着幸福。

sentences.en: Diligence is the path leading to happiness.
sentences.cn: 勤劳是获得幸福的途径。

sentences.en: Every good wish for your future happiness together.
sentences.cn: 预祝你们将来幸福美满。
